content: this legal text summarizes a dispute settlement between multiple parties regarding the division of real estate properties the properties involved are an apartment in castelfidardo a ground floor apartment in numana and a shop and garages in castelfidardo each property has a specified value the parties have agreed to allocate shares of the properties to each individual involved one party will receive a share of the apartment in castelfidardo another party will receive a share of the apartment in numana and the remaining party will receive a share of the shop and garages in castelfidardo the value of each share is also specified
